nodes.text: The rebel refugee zone was the name given to part of the Duros slums in the Duros Sector of the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The zone was home to a number of anti-Imperial rebels who were supported by the Jedi.
The rebel refugee zone appears as a Heroic area in the Duros Sector in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
